name: Revenge of Grand Rhino the Crime Simulator in Nice City
name_original: Revenge of Grand Rhino the Crime Simulator in Nice City
description:
Revenge of Grand Rhino the Crime Simulator in Nice City

Its about survival and smashing in car. All happening is high quality 3D.
Destroy many thing like air force helicopter, military war tank, Sports car, Racing car, Extreme bus driving, Racing bikes, extremely driving car, hit the people, police car, cop.
In this 3D Game you treat your self as wild Rhino and destroy the city. Let's see How much destruction you are going to create in some time periods. Give the proper direction to Rhino By Holding Your Screen.
Each level has its own unique elements.
The ultimate goal is to do as much damage as possible to maximize your score.
Some go ahead and give this funny Simulator Game a try.

Key Features

-> Attractive 3D Model Of Rhino

-> Smooth Game

-> 3D Views

-> Easy Controlling
